column4: Hi. I have a monitor plugged into my laptop. Is it possible to make the laptop screen separate from the monitor screen, so that when I move my mouse to its edge, it doesn't automatically shift over to the other screen?

Basically I want to be able to see my laptop screen's contents, but I never need to move my mouse to it (and on the rare occasion that I do, I can just press some kind of shortcut to make it the active / focused screen. Is that possible?
The best would be to be able to dedicate a workspace to it.
Is it possible to dedicate a workspace to a 2nd screen?
Cause with the default settings, when both screens are on / active, the taskbar only appears on the one.
